title: 要是有人搞到了你服务器的op，你要怎么做
author: qq1220824091

replies.author: qq1220824091
replies.txt_content: 标题: 要是有人搞到了你服务器的op，你要怎么做唉，我原本开了个服务器，结果粗心，没完善就发了出去，别人用各自bug弄到了op，我直接重置，你们嘞。

replies.author: jinyigeng
replies.txt_content:
楼主那么捉急干嘛...
直接查上IP然后Ban调好了
还有，撤销op指令时/deop

replies.author: 左翼yu莫恩
replies.txt_content:
qq1220824091 发表于 2015-8-17 11:37
顶
顶
顶

茶馆不允许顶贴，快用编辑修改

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: /deop 然后/ban /banIP

replies.author: 阿有
replies.txt_content: 还能用BUG弄到OP啊

replies.author: 葫芦葫芦瓢
replies.txt_content: 新人请去看茶馆小贴士

replies.author: .|°夨.忆ヽ
replies.txt_content: 直接ban IP

replies.author: 刘涵博
replies.txt_content: =-=/deop    /banip 就可以了，再不行A.A直接找黑客黑他家电脑

replies.author: 板鱼殿
replies.txt_content: 呵，我管呢，反正我又不是OP

replies.author: tanjiujo
replies.txt_content:
额
现在能弄到op的bug很少了
除非是腐竹缺！去安装那些很久前的插件啊！
什么之类的！

replies.author: shulian
replies.txt_content: 去后台ban

replies.author: 524399hjn
replies.txt_content: 最重要是布吉岛怎么开服233

replies.author: 我滴世界.
replies.txt_content: 如果是平民的话  就让他开全民OP 然后就/op   /deop ××/ban ×× /banip ××

replies.author: ArtInGames
replies.txt_content: 踢掉ip地址

replies.author: 末影龙。
replies.txt_content: 直接banIP

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content: 不开服务器的路过

replies.author: chaitianyu2002
replies.txt_content: 直接benIP

replies.txt_content:
左翼yu莫恩 发表于 2015-8-17 12:09

你是好人！同事也希望这位朋友悬崖勒马。

replies.author: Aleks_Kavli
replies.txt_content:
首先问他的mcbbs ID
然后给他几十万金粒求用BUG获取op的方法
ouo

replies.author: kami4
replies.txt_content: 在OP文件把它去掉不就好了

replies.author: Keterbrine_
replies.txt_content: 把bug找到然后去找解决方法，至于OP下掉就好

replies.txt_content: 表示没开过服，当op都是靠自己努力获得的

replies.author: CN_C.Y.GloryD
replies.txt_content: 双ban回档完事

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content: /banIP +/deop

replies.author: Tndmhhy
replies.txt_content: 必须ban了吧
